title.rendered: Suntory Hibiki 21 Year Old Arita Yaki Ceramic Bottle

content.rendered: Suntory is the oldest whisky making company in Japan. Its origins stretch back to a small shop, started in 1899 by Torii Shinjiro, which specialized in selling imported wines. Today, it is the country’s largest and most recognizable producer of quality whisky. Every year, the company releases a limited edition of handmade, and hand painted ceramic bottles. This particular Hibiki 21 year old is presented in a special shaped ceramic bottle with beautiful illustrations and original wooden box.

excerpt.rendered:
Distillery: Hibiki
Whisky Origin: Japanese
Alcohol Strength: 43%
Bottle Size: 600 Ml
Weight: 3 Kg
